fullplot: The film tells the story of a highly-gifted boy whose parents have demanding and ambitious plans for him - they want him to become a pianist. However, one day the boy, Vitus, is no longer willing to comply with his parents' plans and ambitions because he wants to follow his own star.

title: Vitus

tomatoes.consensus: Though not highly original, Vitus is slightly redeemed by its charm and compelling performances.
